title: Snow day Malzahar glitch
body: Its nothing major but a huge selling point for the snow day malzahar skin was its adorable recall animation with the poro. Currently all you see a blue texture animation and no corresponding particles (aka the love hearts).{{item:3070}} {{champion:90}} . would love to see that fixed when you get the chance and if you're a rioter thank you for taking the time to read this.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This should be resolved with the next patch!
Off topic but any word as to why people in/near Texas are unable to connect to chat?

Not totally sure, but we're investigating! 

MuffyKing made a post asking for more info [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?comment=0004).
I have been noticed! Thanks for the reply! :D

https://d.wattpad.com/story_parts/163505974/images/13ffbf5fee332787.jpg

Seriously though, happy to help! Hope we can get this resolved ASAP!
